import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react" import firebase from "../../firebase/firebase" export const Excel = () => { const [profesionales, setProfesionales] = useState([]) const [montos, setMontos] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { firebase.db.collection("profesionales").onSnapshot(querySnapshot => { const profesionales = [] querySnapshot.docs.forEach(doc => { const { name, id } = doc.data() profesionales.push({ id: doc.id, name }) }) setProfesionales(profesionales) }) }, []) const guardarMontos = (value, id) => { for (var i in profesionales) { if (profesionales[i].value == id) { profesionales[i].monto = value; break; //Stop this loop, we found it! } } console.log(lista) } console.log(profesionales) return
